question: Who is the author of the book "Mr and Mrs Jinnah: The Marriage that Shook India"?
explanation: The book “Mr and Mrs Jinnah: The Marriage that Shook India” has been authored by  well-known journalist  Sheela Redddy.  The author sketches an illuminating portrait of Ruttie Petit, whose marriage to Mohammad Ali Jinnah shocked Bombay society of that time.  The book provides a comprehensive history of the Jinnahs, as well as the era of their marriage, its lengthy descriptive passages are spliced with amusing excerpts from Ruttie’s letters.
